title: Treacherous Little Toad (12U41)
text:
Set:	Black Rider
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Gollum
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	To play, spot a [Gollum] card. Bearer must be a wounded companion. While you can spot a [Gollum] character or a [Gollum] card in your support area, bearer cannot heal.
Rarity:	U
